alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:41PM CDT until July 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Claiborne County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hancock County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 639 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harrogate, or 9 miles east of Middlesboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Tazewell, Tazewell, Harrogate, Howard Quarter, Cumberland Gap, Ewing, Arthur, Powell River Preserve and Rose Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
